wikipedia_page.main: Auckland Campbell Geddes, 1st Baron Geddes,  (21 June 1879 – 8 June 1954) was a British academic, soldier, politician and diplomat. He was a member of David Lloyd George's coalition government during the First World War and also served as Ambassador to the United States.

response: *Auckland Geddes, 1st Baron Geddes (1879–1954), British politician and diplomat
